job.title: Data Engineer
job.description: <ul><li>Knowledge of AWS Infrastructure including S3, SNS, Ec2, CloudWatch and RDS.</li><li>Min 1+ years of experience on Matillion ELT tool and Snowflake Database.</li><li>Min 5+ years of experience with ETL/Data Transformation and one or more related products such as Informatica and SSIS.</li><li>Min 4+ years’ work experience in business intelligence, data warehousing, and logical/physical model design required.</li><li>Advanced working SQL knowledge and experience working with relational databases, query authoring (SQL) as well as working familiarity with a variety of databases.</li><li>Experience in building AWS Data Pipelines using Python/Scala, Apache Spark, SparkSQL, S3 Data Lake, Snowflake, Redshift.</li><li>Good to have - Experience with any of the NoSQL datastores such as Elasticsearch, MongoDB, DynamoDB, Cassandra.</li></ul><p><br></p>
